attributes.action: Tarmac over some of Richmond Park to create a space to erect a 200ft column with statue of Gordon Brown on top.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the battle of Trafalgar a grateful nation erected a monument to Lord Nelson and this was Trafalgar Square - a major landmark in London. What better tribute from today's grateful citizens than a monument to mark the achievements of Gordon Brown over his handling of one of the most significant crisis that England has ever faced.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
